catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 776
description: reflection of blue and brown snow-capped mountain in body of water; red and brown banks/landscape across middle, with horizontal row of white squares and rectangles along top of image; subtle sheen over mountain reflection/body of water
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Gleanings of Mt. Fuji (Kobore Fuji 拾遺富士)
title: Projection of Mt. Fuji
